languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, не рекомендую приближаться к данной конструкции. Инквизиция объявила ее запретной и нашпиговала пространство вокруг нее минами. Наши авгуры их не засекут".
"Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, не рекомендую приближаться к данной конструкции. Инквизиция объявила ее запретной и нашпиговала пространство вокруг нее минами. Наши авгуры их не засекут".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I recommend you to avoid this construction. The Inquisition declared it forbidden and crowded the surroundings with mines. Our augurs will not detect them."
"Lord Captain, I recommend you to avoid this construction. The Inquisition declared it forbidden and crowded the surroundings with mines. Our augurs will not detect them."
"Lord Captain, I recommend you avoid this site. The Inquisition declared it forbidden and packed its surroundings with mines. Our augurs will not be able to detect them."
"Lord Captain, I recommend you avoid this site. The Inquisition declared it forbidden and packed its surroundings with mines. Our augurs will not be able to detect them."
"Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."

languages.text: “船长老大，我建议你离这个地方远点。审判庭说这片区域是禁区，还在周围铺设了无数太空雷，我们的俄歇矩阵根本探测不到。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，我建议你离这个地方远点。审判庭说这片区域是禁区，还在周围铺设了无数太空雷，我们的俄歇矩阵根本探测不到。”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, je vous déconseille d'approcher du portail. L'Inquisition a fait boucler toute la zone avant de la transformer en champ de mines. Nos augures ne seront pas en mesure de les détecter. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, je vous déconseille d'approcher du portail. L'Inquisition a fait boucler toute la zone avant de la transformer en champ de mines. Nos augures ne seront pas en mesure de les détecter. »

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, ich rate davon ab, Euch dem Tor zu nähern. Die Inquisition hat das gesamte Gebiet um das Tor herum zum Sperrgebiet erklärt und vermint. Die Minen können von unseren Auguren nicht aufgespürt werden."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, ich rate davon ab, Euch dem Tor zu nähern. Die Inquisition hat das gesamte Gebiet um das Tor herum zum Sperrgebiet erklärt und vermint. Die Minen können von unseren Auguren nicht aufgespürt werden."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, aconsejo no acercarnos a ese portal. La Inquisición ha declarado restringida el área que lo rodea y la ha llenado de minas. Los augures no las detectarán».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, aconsejo no acercarnos a ese portal. La Inquisición ha declarado restringida el área que lo rodea y la ha llenado de minas. Los augures no las detectarán».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、 ゲートに近づかないことをお勧めします。異端審問庁はゲート周辺一帯を立ち入り禁止とし、地雷で埋め尽くしました。我々のスキャナーでは探知できないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、 ゲートに近づかないことをお勧めします。異端審問庁はゲート周辺一帯を立ち入り禁止とし、地雷で埋め尽くしました。我々のスキャナーでは探知できないでしょう」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, geçide yaklaşmanızı tavsiye etmem. Engizisyon fermanıyla geçidi çevreleyen alana girmek yasaklandı ve bölgeye mayın döşendi. Alametlerimiz bu mayınları tespit edemez."
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, I would advise against approaching the gate. The Inquisition has declared the entire area around it off-limits and packed it with mines. Our augurs won't be able to detect them."
